The Lego Movie

Rank: 98


An ordinary LEGO construction worker- thought to be the prophesied as "special"- is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.


Director: Phil Lord

Writer: Phil Lord, Christopher Miller, Dan Hageman

Stars: Chris Pratt, Will Ferrell, Elizabeth Banks

Tags: Action Epic, Adventure Epic, Computer Animation, Dystopian Sci,Fi, Fantasy Epic, Globetrotting Adventure, Quest, Quirky Comedy, Satire, Sci,Fi Epic
